name: Cooking Tycoons 2: 3 in 1 Bundle
summary: Sharpen your skill as you cook a variety of delicious meals all over the world! Become the master chef you always dreamed of becoming! Cook hundreds of tasty dishes with all the possible kitchen appliances and countless ingredients! Spend your profits on upgrades on ingredients and appliances for your restaurant to attract more clients! This comprehensive collection includes three great cooking games: Breakfast Bar Tycoon, Sushi Time, Food Truck Tycoon – Asian Cuisine. It also provides expansion packs both for Breakfast Bar Tycoon and Food Truck Tycoon – Asian Cuisine! Making dishes have never been so much fun and exciting!
